alert.note: Alert for Granville; Vance (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:50AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Vance and Granville Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 249 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oxford, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Oxford, Kittrell, Stem, Stovall, Gillburg, Steele Creek Marina & Campground, Kerr Lake, South Henderson and Dabney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
